mapper.sql: PICTURES_ID, TITLE, NAME, PATH, CREATETIME, MASTER_ID, BZ
mapper.select:
select p.TITLE, p.NAME, a.PATH, a.CREATETIME, a.MASTER_ID, a.BZ, a.PICTURES_ID from p where 1 = 1
and ( p.TITLE like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.KEYW}),'%') or p.NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.KEYW}),'%') or a.PICTURES_ID LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.KEYW}),'%') or a.MASTER_ID LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.KEYW}),'%') )
